page.title: 12SUPERMARKETS IN HERNE BAY
page.content: Herns Bay's two busiest shops each fall within this block they are the large foodshops which belong to the Safeway and Tesco chain of stores. Work was begun on Safeways, the newer of the two, in 1978 and the store was opened two years later. This store incorporates its own bakery and off licence and it sells a range of stationery and other non food products. The roof of the store can be used by customers for free parking and this car park is served by lifts.Safeways has become very popular and its wide aisles make for easier shopping than in Tescos its main rival although the Tesco prices tend to be slightly lower. Also as Tescos is some distance from a car park people buying in bulk would usually use Safeways.
